about_the_game: Dice with the Devil is a party-based, dice-chucking, deck-building roguelike. Assemble your crew of adventurers, each with a different dice requirement. Some adventurers have simple requirements but offer limited attack benefits. Other adventurers require you to press your luck to fulfill their requirements, but can really dish out the damage. Adventurers can combo with other party members, allowing a clever player to perform massive attacks in a single turn. However, Dice with the Devil is a game of timing - make sure your combos pop off at just the right time, as opportunities like this may not come around again soon. Adventurers become more powerful after each use but only have a limited number of uses before they retire - adding an additional wrinkle to the timing puzzle. Between battles, upgrade your party with new adventurers, powerful items, and unique relics - all to help you defeat increasingly more powerful enemies.
detailed_description:
Chain Attacks


Certain attacks can trigger adjacent adventurers in the same turn. Time these attacks right and you can unleash a devastating attack - helpful when going up against the more nasty demons in hell.


Use Dice to Attack


Roll dice to activate your adventurers. Basic adventurers have simple dice requirements, but more advanced adventurers will require you to press your luck to meet their dice needs.


Heroes Level Up when they Attack


Each time an adventurer is used, they level up, providing increased damage and stronger abilities. Be careful not to level up your team too fast, or too slow.


Save your Heroes' Souls


After an adventurer levels up 7 times, they will ascend into heaven - great for them, not so great for your party.


Features

Build your party from over 20 adventurers to pick from.
Adventurers level up to become even more powerful, and eventually ascend to heaven.
Select from over XXX items to equip your adventurers with.
Find game-breaking combos with over 120 unique relics to augment your playstyle.
With 20 unique demons to defeat, every playthrough is unique.
